sentences.sContent: The so-called noise is chaotic, dissonant sounds, and more than normal people psychology, the volume of the hearing.
sentences.sContent_eng: The so-called noise is chaotic, dissonant sounds, and more than normal people psychology, the volume of the hearing.
sentences.sCn: 所谓噪音即是混乱、不谐和的声音，以及超过人们正常心理、听觉的音量。

sentences.sContent: All that is harsh and dissonant in my life melts into one sweet harmony---and my adoration spreads wings like a glad bird on its flight across the sea.
sentences.sContent_eng: All that is harsh and dissonant in my life melts into one sweet harmony---and my adoration spreads wings like a glad bird on its flight across the sea.
sentences.sCn: 我生命中所有的浅陋和纠结，化入一道甜蜜的和谐---对你的崇敬如一只快乐的飞鸟，在海面上张开双翼。

synos.tran: 刺耳的；不谐和的；不调和的

remMethod.val: dis(分开) + son(声音) + ant → 声音分散的 → 不和谐的

words.tran: 不一致；不调和；不和谐音

trans.tranCn: 不和谐的， 不一致的
